# zendesk_dynamic_content_variant (Resource)

This defines the variants of a dynamic_content. In order to delete this resource, need to remove the zendesk_dynamic_content resource and use terraform state rm for zendesk_dynamic_content_variant.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# API reference:
#   https://developer.zendesk.com/rest_api/docs/support/dynamic_content#json-format-for-variants

resource "zendesk_dynamic_content" "example" {
  name = "My Dynamic Content"
}

resource "zendesk_dynamic_content_variant" "example" {
  content                 = "Hello, {{ticket.requester.name}}!"
  locale_id               = 1
  dynamic_content_item_id = zendesk_dynamic_content.example.id
  default                 = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String) Content of the dynamic content variant.
- `default` (Boolean) Default resources cannot be deleted; only managed resources can be set as default a particular zendesk_dynamic_content.
- `dynamic_content_item_id` (Number) Reference for the dynamic content item.
- `locale_id` (Number) Locale Id for the dynamic content variant.

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- `url` (String) The API url of this dynamic content variant.

## Notes

- In order to delete this resource, you need to remove the `zendesk_dynamic_content` resource and use `terraform state rm` for `zendesk_dynamic_content_variant`.
- Default resources cannot be deleted; only managed resources can be set as default for a particular `zendesk_dynamic_content`.
